snippet: Former President Alberto Fujimori on Thursday was convicted of using public money to influence newspaper coverage during his 2000 re-election campaign.
abstract: Peru's former Pres Alberto Fujimori is convicted of using public money to influence newspaper coverage during his 2000 reelection campaign; is sentenced to eight years in prison to run concurrently with his previous sentence of 25 years for ordering killings of 25 people.
lead_paragraph: Former President Alberto Fujimori on Thursday was convicted of using public money to influence newspaper coverage during his 2000 re-election campaign.

headline.main: Peru: Jailed Ex-President Is Convicted of Corruption
headline.print_headline: Peru: Jailed Ex-President Is Convicted of Corruption
